channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024041184
item.description:
Report X-2024041184

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-21
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Daniel Vallejos Operations Supervisor called to report a spill in trailer 84985 of a UN2880, CALCIUM HYPOCHLORITE,HYDRATED, 5.1, PG II,. Daniel stated when the crew open the roll up door to unload the trailer. Daniel stated two pallets had fell over and started to come out the bottom of the roll up door while opening. Daniel stated 1 pail of the product the top lid came off and spilled what looked to be tablets on the trailer floor. Daniel stated he had already recouped the pallets and put the product (tablets) back in the pail and secured the lid to the pail. Safety advised Daniel any time th ere is a Hazmat spill safety is to be notified immediately before any cleanup is to start. Daniel stated that he would call safety next time before cleaning any spill. Daniel stated the spill was cleaned and the pallets were recouped and already unloaded off the trailer.
